title: Germ-fighting catheter coating may help prevent infections

title_detail.value: Germ-fighting catheter coating may help prevent infections

summary: In an innovation that may ultimately help to prevent deadly bloodstream infections, a team of biomedical engineers and infectious disease specialists have developed a coating to keep intravascular catheters from becoming a haven for harmful bacteria.

summary_detail.value: In an innovation that may ultimately help to prevent deadly bloodstream infections, a team of biomedical engineers and infectious disease specialists have developed a coating to keep intravascular catheters from becoming a haven for harmful bacteria.
